name: Castle Of Illvision
description:
Castle Of Illvision is a text based adventure game where you play a knight going to investigate a strange castle in order to save their friend! Use verbs like HIT, TAKE and LOOK to solve puzzles and save your friend! 

  • Fight 50 enemies
  • Find 30 items
  • Read 1234 lines of text
  • Explore 83 rooms of the map
